alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:46PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Custer and northwestern Oglala Lakota Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 346 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Fairburn, or 23 miles northeast of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Red Shirt Table Overlook around 405 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern South Dakota.
